pages.text: FTB Quests is used in this modpack, you can find the quests button on the top left corner when opening inventory. $(br)Almost all quests have different kinds of rewards, remember to claim them. $(br)Search $(5)＠FTBQuests$() in JEI for items that are related to the quests system. $(br)Some quests, $(c)(like submitting FE)$() require a $(5)Task Screen$().

To submit FE, put down a Task Screen and right click to configure it, then connect it with wires to input energy.$(br2)§lThe Omnipedia§r$(br2) The Omnipedia is your first quest reward and can be crafted with a $(6)Akashic Tome$(). In case of a modpack update, put your Omnipedia in crafting table to update it. It contains almost all guide books provided by mods. Right click with Omnipedia to select a book.

When the Omnipedia is in its transformed state (i.e. turned into another book), $(9)Left click air$() with it in your hand to turn it back into Omnipedia. In its transformed state, $(c)Sneak$() and toss the item (Keybind is "/" by default) to take the currently transformed book out of the Omnipedia.
